title: Handkerchief, 1939
medium:
Medium: rayon
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer
description: Commemorative handkerchief showing a central five-pointed star surrounded by an airplain, train, boat and automobile with a border formed by scenes at the Golden Gate International World's Fair, Treasure Isle, San Francisco, 1939. Printed in shades of blue, red and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1939.
1939. Medium: rayon
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer. 1941-61-15.
